snippet: Yohan Blake of Jamaica, will not defend his title at next month’s world championships in Moscow because of a nagging hamstring injury, his manager said.
abstract: Yohan Blake of Jamaica, world 100-meter champion, will not defend his title at next month’s world championships in Moscow because of a nagging hamstring injury.
lead_paragraph: Yohan Blake of Jamaica, will not defend his title at next month’s world championships in Moscow because of a nagging hamstring injury, his manager said.
